title: Bloomberg Markets: Blackberry Falls Most in Two Years
itunes:title: Bloomberg Markets: Blackberry Falls Most in Two Years
description:
Bloomberg Markets with Carol Massar and Cory Johnson. GUEST: Gerrit De Vynck Canadian Telecom Reporter Bloomberg News Discussing Blackberry falling the most in almost two-and-a-half years after its quarterly earnings report showed surprisingly weak revenue from software, marring what was otherwise shaping up to be a banner year.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
